Still can’t believe we’re the parents of a kindergarten student! Henry started his new adventure by bounding onto the bus this morning, and thanks to some great staff who helped him get through this huge transition today, he went on to have a great first day! We celebrated with all his favorite things tonight - hot dogs, cake and ice cream. :-)
